title: Demoweir's Rise
description: Umuosmar - the once peaceful kingdom of the dwarven lands has now become the central point of contention in an ongoing power struggle between ogres, giants, elves, and their newest and most deadly enemy - the cyclopses.The false demon woman who operates under the guise of an elven goddess has been released from her prison and now seeks full power over the kingdom.War-torn and ravaged - friendships shall be tested, alliances broken, and only a handful will live to see the light of day once more. Who will prevail in the once peaceful kingdom as the dust settles? Will magic be wielded for good or evil?Kingdoms shall rise; kingdoms shall fall; but who shall live through it all?
author: Michael Benningfield
